TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to run 'Standard Report'.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on General option.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click General option.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click option.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Select Crash Distribution for Day of Week option.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select Crash Distribution for Day of Week option.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select Crash Distribution for Day of Week option.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select Crash Distribution for Day of Week option.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click filter icon.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click filter icon.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click filter icon.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select 'From Date'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select 'From Date'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select 'From Date'.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select 'To Date'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select 'To Date'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select 'To Date'.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click 'Apply and Run' button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click 'Apply and Run' button'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click 'Apply and Run' button.
